35512.summary: Some customers across the Lower Mainland are experiencing interruptions to Internet, Television and Home Phone services due to BC Hydro related difficulties. It is possible you may have power at your home, but our equipment servicing the area maybe offline. We are working along side BC Hydro to restore service as quickly and safely as possible and apologize for any inconvenience caused.
